EmailTemplate.description: System Limits Workaround Notification - Notification sent to SF internal Support
EmailTemplate.name: System Limits Workaround Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: System Limits Workaround for {!System_Limits_Tracker__c.Name} Now Enforced
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good day Salesforce team
This is a notification that the limits for {!System_Limits_Tracker__c.Name} reached a threshold percentage of:
{!System_Limits_Tracker__c.Enforce_Workaround_Percentage__c}%
An alternative workaround process was now enforced
Please activate the below workflow rules in production as soon as possible.
- CSC Case Closure - CSC Case Creation - CSC Email Receipt
Regards, System Generated.
